main event: An Air Force personnel reported seeing a bright light that appeared to increase and decrease in size before disappearing over Cleveland, Ohio on October 23, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for 20 minutes.
The observer could not determine the altitude or distance of the object.
No other observations were reported, and the report concluded that there was insufficient data to evaluate the sighting.
The object was described as a bright light that appeared to change in size before disappearing.
The sighting occurred on a partly cloudy evening, and the observer stated the object moved behind and in front of clouds at times.
sighted object: a bright light that appeared to change in size
